document_data.name: Ulhai Shan
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ulhai Shan''', also called the '''Ulhai Mountains''', was a large mountain range found in the [[Hordelands]] and [[Kara-tur]].
document_data.Geography: The Ulhai Shan served as a natural barrier between the vast [[Ama Basin]] and the frozen wastes of the [[Land of the Snow Spirits]]. The mountains formed a wall along the western and northwestern swamps and forests of the Ama Basin. Many unnamed tributaries flowed south from Ulhai Shan to feed the mighty [[Ama River]]. The Ulhai Shan terminated on its southern end at the [[Mountain of Iron]].
